explanation: [0-0] The scene is set in a room with red and white patterned floor tiles and a wall with a red pattern. There's a woman and two young boys; both children are wearing green and white clothes, and the woman is wearing blue trousers and a black T-shirt with "Pakistan Independence Day" printed on it. She has heavy makeup on, including bright red lipstick. Both boys are wearing white T-shirts with rhinoceros prints and multi-colored trousers. One of the boys is wearing sunglasses, and the other is wearing a green headscarf. The three of them are standing side by side, with the woman in the middle and an arm around each boy.

[0-5] They then walk forward, and a man appears in the scene, leaning back on a blue plastic stool. He is wearing a khaki T-shirt and blue jeans. The man has blonde hair and a smile on his face. He rests his head on his hand, watching the three people in front of him.
